foundationdesc: VMware Foundation provides employees with five days each year to apply towards volunteer work and I am an active volunteer from the VMware Bangalore, India office. The VMware foundation volunteer team consists of a great cross-section of people from all different departments within the office. One of the best aspect is being able to meet new people and bond through teamwork.

Regular Service Learning activities such as teaching English and promoting safe driving near the office, advance the quality of education for girls through technology, supporting the local NGO/school etc were some of the activities which I have volunteered for.

certifications.certname: Oracle Certified Professional, Java SE 6 Programmer

achievements: Winner of 2 IBM Liquid Competition Events and runner up in 3
